content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I previously used the "google" command to search for information on learning about different cultures and places. My computer returned a list of websites related to the search term, including lesselfes.com, larryferlazzo.edublogs.org, shrm.org, blog.academicyear.org, au.reachout.com, beistravel.com, uagc.edu, and wikihow.com. \n\nAs you, you used the "browse_website" command to visit the website larryferlazzo.edublogs.org, which provides resources for learning about the cultures of different countries, including information on communication style, dress, gestures, musical instruments, and school lunches. It also includes photo galleries, infographics, and videos on various topics related to global culture, as well as resources for teachers such as lesson plans and handouts. The website does not provide information on specific topics of interest. Links on the website include: \'Log in (https://larryferlazzo.edublogs.org/wp-login.php)\', \'About WordPress (https://edublogs.org/wp-admin/user/about.php)\', \'About Edublogs (https://edublogs.org/about/)\', \'Edublogs.org (https://edublogs.org/)\', \'Documentation (https://help.edublogs.org/)\'. \n\nYou attempted to use the "get_hyperlinks" command to retrieve hyperlinks from the website, but it failed due to returning too much output. Do not execute this command again with the same arguments.\n\nI received a command from you to browse the website lesselfes.com to learn about different cultures. The command asked what information you were interested in learning about on the website.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The website provides information about Les Elfes international summer and winter camps, including typical program activities, additional courses, language lessons, staff and safety, and dates and prices for summer, winter, and spring programs. It also discusses the benefits of understanding different cultures, including enhanced career opportunities, personal growth and development, and exposure to diverse practices and cultures. The website also includes information about school trips, ski trips, field trips, and partner hotels. \n \n Links: ['\\nFacebook-f\\n  (https://www.facebook.com/LesElfesVerbier)', '\\nTwitter\\n  (https://twitter.com/LesElfesCamps)', '\\nInstagram\\n  (https://www.instagram.com/leselfes)', '\\nYoutube\\n  (https://www.youtube.com/user/LesElfesVerbier)', '\\nLinkedin\\n  (https://www.linkedin.com/company/les-elfes-international)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/love.txt"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command read_file returned: Error: [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/love.txt'"}]
"""
